UnlockedPOIs.Name: Genuine Solutions
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Lacking innovation, poor customer service, struggling reputation.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Google
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Invades privacy, knows too much, and tracks your life.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Microsoft
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Cluttered software, endless updates, and constant crashes

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Apple
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Sells shiny gadgets, forces you to buy their ecosystem.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Amazon
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Delivers everything, destroys local businesses, and work ethics.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Meta
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Wastes time, promotes envy, and spreads fake connections.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Samsung
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Overpriced devices, bloatware, and endless pre-installed apps

UnlockedPOIs.Name: AMD
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Riding on Intel's coattails, occasional performance bursts, chip instability.

UnlockedPOIs.Name: Uber
UnlockedPOIs.Description: Exploits drivers, surge pricing, surge of bad publicity.

UnlockedNPCs.Description:
Role: Works extra hours and contributes to your income during downtime.
Personality: Diligent and hardworking. Takes pride in maximizing every moment.

Role: Operates covertly to reduce your risk of detection.
Background: Former intelligence operative. Mysterious and skilled in staying off the radar.

Investment Strategy: High-risk, high-reward. Loves to invest in emerging markets and startups.
Background: Former gambler turned investor, always seeking the thrill of a successful venture.

Role: Busks on the street, adding to your income with his musical talents.
Personality: Free-spirited and artistic. Believes in the power of music to bring joy.

Investment Strategy: Conservative and long-term. Prefers stable, blue-chip stocks and bonds.
Background: Finance expert with a knack for predicting market trends. Known for her patience.

Role: Specializes in erasing digital footprints and maintaining anonymity.
Background: Hacker turned agent. Tech-savvy and elusive.

Role: Takes odd jobs and performs small tasks, earning you money.
Personality: Helpful and resourceful. Always ready to lend a hand.

Role: Creates diversions to divert attention away from your activities.
Background: Circus-born agent, master of misdirection in covert operations.

Investment Strategy: Focuses on rapid growth opportunities. Enjoys technology and innovative companies.
Background: Tech-savvy entrepreneur turned investor, always looking for the next big thing.
